issue.title: Robot falls while carrying tools in habitat

content.raw:
I have reproduced it using the standard walking script: https://youtu.be/PH85ipj2KzI 

I have a rosbag here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0By94Clyfum3XTFQxYmZSdHp3QjQ/view?usp=sharing

We are running 5 constellations at once and trying to come up with new walking parameters that minimize a physics/controller glitch. It's getting ridiculous.
